So they can be heated and um and cooled , and they change the shape of um the metal . So , for example , a screw that's holding something together could expand and it would force all the components apart .

speaker: Speaker_B
text: So um , the benefits of this for our product would be that when it came to the end of its product life , if it was heated , um everything would spring apart .
